name: Yodir's Halloween
description:
Help Yodir fly to the nearby town to haunt some children for Halloween. 

The problem is her broom is malfunctioning and not fast enough to flight against gravity. Upgrade her broom to gain more speed. To do so travel across the swamp earning frogs to spend on upgrades.  Press and hold w/s or up/down arrow keys to tilt the direction of the broom. 

None of the art/music is mine, credits at the end of the game. All art is properly credited, and free to use. Pm any problem.

Happy Halloween!!
